sources.name: Indeed and Glassdoor cut ~1,300 jobs citing AI transformation
sources.notes: Indeed and Glassdoor cut ~1,300 jobs citing AI transformation

summary: Indeed and Glassdoor cut ~1,300 jobs citing AI transformation: Recruit Holdings, parent company of Indeed and Glassdoor, cut approximately 1,300 jobs across both platforms. CEO Hisayuki Idekoba explicitly framed the cuts around AI: 'AI is changing the world' and
